message.name: ERR_SERVICE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: A service must be selected.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: A provider must be selected.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_METHOD_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: An enquiry method must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CREATION_TIME_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: A date of creation must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_FROM_DATE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: A from date for the requested service must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_CLOSED_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED
message.locale: A service enquiry with a status of 'Closed' cannot be updated.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_FIELD_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED_ONCE_CREATED
message.locale: The %1s cannot be updated once the service enquiry is created.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_METHOD_WEB_OR_EMAIL_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: The method of this enquiry is %1s, it cannot be deleted.

message.name: INF_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_NO_PROVIDER_DATA
message.locale: No Responses Received

message.name: INF_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_AVERAGE_RESPONSE_TIME_LESS_THAN_1_DAY
message.locale: <1 day

message.name: INF_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_AVERAGE_RESPONSE_TIME_1_DAY
message.locale: 1 day

message.name: INF_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_AVERAGE_RESPONSE_TIME
message.locale: %1n days

message.name: INF_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_PERCENTAGE_RESPONSE
message.locale: %1n% of %2n

message.name: INF_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_CREATION_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: on %1d

message.name: INF_NEW_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
message.locale: A new service enquiry has been submitted for %1n client(s) for service %2s by %3s in %4s.

message.name: INF_NO_PROVIDER_ON_SERVICE
message.locale: A provider must be selected for the service, as service enquiries relate to a provider.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_ENQUIRY_METHOD_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED_ONCE_CREATED
message.locale: The 'Enquiry Method' cannot be updated once the service enquiry is created.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_CREATION_DATE_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED_ONCE_CREATED
message.locale: The 'Creation Date' cannot be updated once the service enquiry is created.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_URGENCY_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED_ONCE_CREATED
message.locale: The 'Urgency' cannot be updated once the service enquiry is created.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_FROM_DATE_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED_ONCE_CREATED
message.locale: The 'From Date' cannot be updated once the service enquiry is created.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_TO_DATE_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED_ONCE_CREATED
message.locale: The 'To Date' cannot be updated once the service enquiry is created.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_FREQUENCY_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED_ONCE_CREATED
message.locale: The 'Frequency' cannot be updated once the service enquiry is created.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_TIME_OF_DAY_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED_ONCE_CREATED
message.locale: The 'Time of Day' cannot be updated once the service enquiry is created.

message.name: ERR_FV_SERVICE_FROM_DATE_IN_PAST
message.locale: The Service From Date must be on or after today.

message.name: ERR_XFV_SERVICE_FROM_DATE_AFTER_SERVICE_TO_DATE
message.locale: The Service From Date, %1d, must be on or before the Serice To Date, %2d.
